questions: What does the log "[2021-10-06 08:35:35 +0000] [1] [INFO] Handling signal: winch" indicate?
What is the signal "winch" thrown for?
Can the log "[2021-10-06 08:35:35 +0000] [1] [INFO] Handling signal: winch" be ignored?
answer:
## Other issues
Sometimes you can see the log like this:

```
[2021-10-06 08:35:35 +0000] [1] [INFO] Handling signal: winch
```

This can be ignored. Signal winch is thrown when you resize console.
